transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Ha ji sir very good afternoon. Rachna Enterprises se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ha ji sir main Vidhi baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART team se. Us din baat hui thi na aap se? Aapki services ke regarding sir.
Customer: But aapko Kannada aata hai?
Executive: Nahi sir. Hindi mein discuss kar sakte hain hum dheere dheere.
Customer: No madam. Kannada nahi aate.
Executive: But sir aapka jo bhi sara kaam aapne us time production wagere karaya tha wo to sara Hindi mein hi karaya tha sir. Agar aap us time aapka jo production hua tha jo product wagere aapke add hue the starting mein.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aapne Hindi mein hi add karai thi na sir?
Customer: No Kannada mein.
Executive: Nahi sir Hindi mein thi maine recording suni hui hai.
Customer: Aise leading manager Bharat usme Hindi Kannada isliye add kiya tha but main Kannada only Kannada Hindi language thoda thoda aata hai.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai hum thode thode mein hi discuss kar lete hain sir koi dikkat thodi hai. Haan.
Executive: Aapka main concern aa raha tha na that you are not that you are not getting relevant buyleads.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Right? So what type of issue you are facing sir?
Customer: Sales nahi ho raha. Only lead milega but sales nahi hota. Quality se different problem hota hai.
Executive: Okay quality problem you are facing price issue you are facing.
Customer: Haan price issue haan.
Executive: Okay. So abhi jo aap leads consume kar rahe ho wo aap apne local area se kar rahe ho sir ya pan India level pe kar rahe ho?
Customer: Local area.
Executive: Local area matlab aapka ye jo location hai ek minute main batati hu.
Customer: Karnataka.
Executive: Udupi Karnataka ka right?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aur aap sirf Udupi Karnataka se hi buyleads lena chahte ho aur wahin ka hi chahiye aapko?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay. But dekhiye Karnataka mein sir leads to available hai hamare pass right. Ha sometime ho sakta hai ki client ko price thoda sa jitna aap de rahe ho uske margin mein kam chahiye ho. Right waha to price negotiation aap kar sakte ho sir.
Customer: Haan but quality reduce karna thoda mushkil hota hai madam.
Executive: Quality mein?
Customer: Quality mein reduce karna mushkil hota hai quality.
Executive: I understand sometime I understand sometime clients demanding cheap products and cheap price right. And you are dealing in quality products with quality price. Right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: So dekhiye har tarah ke clients available hai sir right aapke offline mein bhi hai online mein bhi hai. Aap agar aapko aisa problem face kar rahe ho to aap sirf GST verified leads consume karo. Jo purane clients ke GST verified leads aate hain na. Haan.
Executive: Aap sirf wahi consume karo to fir ye jo problem aap face kar rahe ho na. Haan. Mostly GST verified leads mein kya hota hai ki order value badi hoti hai. Right badi order value mein kya hota hai ki agar aap 100 200 kam bhi kar doge to aapka margin aaram se nikal aata hai. Right problem waha par aati hai jaha par ek piece do piece ki requirement aati hai aur price bhi kam hota hai. Right to aap bulk orders mein deal karo aur GST verified leads mein deal karo. To ye jo price wala issue aap bata rahe ho na ye automatic solve ho jayega. Is filter mein GST usme bola haan.
Executive: Bilkul GST filter is available. Haan. And order value filter is also available. Haan. Right to waha se aap filter apply karke bhi continue kar sakte ho. Right and dusri cheez ki agar aapko kuch guidance hai jaise abhi aapka jaise red chilli powder ka product added hai samber powder ka product added hai rasam powder ka product added hai to sirf inhi teen powder mein deal karte hain sir?
Customer: No only three powder. Samber powder rasam powder and red chilli powder.
Executive: Yeah. Okay aur koi bhi product nahi hai sir jisme aap deal karte hain?
Customer: Nahi madam. Nahi hai. Okay. Just a second. So ek kaam hum ye bhi kar sakte hain ki Bharat aapko ek bar video meeting pe connect karega. Aise Kannada leading manager nahi mila isko sir madam.
Executive: Sir actually we are calling from we are calling you from head office right and there is no person available who talks with you in Kannada. Haan. That's why we are talking with you in Hindi or English only. Only. Yes. But Karnataka mein maine leading manager milta hai Karnataka mein. Milta hai nahi sir agar agar main connect karna chahta tha Kannada wala.
Executive: Sir wo sirf field wale jo sales person hote hain wo hote hain unka jo kaam hota hai wo sirf aapko onboard karana hota hai IndiaMART pe. Haan. Uske baad aapki jo company assign hoti hai wo direct head office mein assign hoti hai. Haan. To agar aapko kuch bhi problem hai to jo bhi call ya jo bhi aapke pass video meetings jate hain wo head office se directly jate hain. Haan. Right. Kannada manager koi nahi hai. Nahi sir. Okay. Matlab if in case mid of the year agar koi person available hota hai Kannada mein matlab koi person join karta hai hume. Haan. To definitely hum aapki company unko assign kar sakte hain ya hum unko handover kar sakte hain but abhi to aisa koi bhi person hamare pass available nahi hai jo aap se Kannada mein discussion kar paye. Theek hai baki koi issue nahi hai hum dheere dheere aap se discuss kar lenge aap ek video meeting pe aa sakte ho sir. Bharat aapko ek bari connect karenge uske liye. Jisri thalpa aane didi next week. Next week like Monday or Tuesday? Haan Monday or Tuesday. Monday or Tuesday. To kis time pe connect kar sakte hain hum aapko? Haan. Sir kis time pe connect kar sakte hain hum aapko? Tuesday 10:30 to 11. 10:30 to 11. Theek hai Bharat aapko ek bari call karenge video meeting ke liye theek hai. Join kijiye hum kuch cheeze bhi aapko sikhaenge yaha par jisse aapka price ka aur jo irrelevancy ka issue aa raha hai usko kaise solve kar sakte hain aur kuch products mein bhi hum aapko update karenge. Okay. Theek hai and aapke pass sir ek feedback message aayega whatsapp pe mere liye. IndiaMART ke liye nahi hai sir mere liye aayega to please us pe satisfied kijiyega. Haan. Okay sir. Thank you. Okay. Haan ji okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Sales are not increasing.

- Only leads are generated, but no sales.

- Quality and price issues with leads.

- Wants a Kannada-speaking manager.



Resolution:

- Advised to consume GST-verified leads.

- Suggested dealing in bulk orders.

- Informed about GST and order value filters.

- Executive will schedule a video meeting.

- Explained that Kannada-speaking managers are not available.



Next Steps: 

- Bharat will call for a video meeting Tuesday 10:30-11 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, gst, price, quality, video meeting
